title: ZED is not balanced
body:
Hey Zed players,
just wanted to know if you also think that {{champion:238}}   has **too high energy costs** ?

replies.body: Ja besser Buffet Zed auf 0 Kosten  damit er wieder Balance ist und ihn mal  endlich jemand spielt. Ich schreibe Deutsch, weil es mich nervt, dass manche nicht verstehen wo sie hier gelandet sind. <3
Das regt mich auch immer auf xD
I thought you mean zed is unbalanced because he is so OP

He is R+W+E+Q+(maybe 1 autoattack)+R and the enemy is dead and Zed in safety.

He shouldnt be only countered by Zhonyas or quicksilver, it should be possible to outplay him without these items.
For example to interrupt his Ult with a stun and it shouldnt bring him back to its old position (which is quite unfair, 0 risk for him if the enemy has under 40% hp)

They should for example make his ult a Dash skillshot.

Zed Ult shouldn`t allow him to blink to his old position.
There is just no counter against that, which is "toxic" in S5 (as far as i remember, thats why riot reworked a few champion)
If this feature is gone he will need to use his W to flee, which should be the way for him

The whole Point of zed is to be able to make plays with his ult and his shadows. If you remove the shadow of his ult this would just remove so much fun and outplay potential of zed.

There are many ways for countering zed, for example qss and zhonias, or various ults (liss, kayle, etc)

In lategame Zed already has a hard time to do something when the enemy have those items built and if you cant swap around with ur ult anymore, zed is just nerved to the ground.

I think zed is extremly balanced right now, hes not even picked/banned every game. You have to be able to play around the enemy team and their items, to be awarded. That takes some game awareness and skill.

zed should stay as he is

No, its not high enought, he is far too mobile and has far to less possibilities to counter (and builing Zhonyas and quicksilver is NOT a way to counter somebody, that wouold mean you lose a lot of movebility and damage only to survive 1 ult.)

I think zed is to overpowerd with some items i think ist unbalanced this kit i think he should have lower damage because ist not normal that a champ make 450 damage with 1 a and 1 full item with no damage and only krits and so stuff with only 198 damage why ist so a shit game vs a zed he can use so fast ulty that you cant use zhonias fast enought and thet buff of the range is not cool for all adc or alll champs with not many hp have big Problems so why a buff nerf him....
